cards.name: Capital One 360
cards.description: I use this for my joint account. Easy to use and with a great app.

cards.name: Ally
pros: Usually has some of the best CD rates.
cons: Website is not that user friendly.
Still relies on slow, outdated paper forms to accomplish tasks.

cards.name: Bank Of America
cards.description: My primary brick and mortar bank.
pros: Good cashback rates on credit cards if you have Platinum status.
Allows investments to count towards Platinum status minimums.
cons: High fees for low balance accounts.
